Class OfficerController

java.lang.Object
OfficerController
public class OfficerController extends Object
Controller.

This OfficerController class manages officer-related actions such as registering as Officer-in-Charge, viewing assigned projects, checking registration status, replying to enquiries, booking flats, and generating receipts.

  • Constructor Details

    • OfficerController

      public OfficerController(Officer officer)
      Constructs the controller for a specific officer.
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer associated with this controller.

  • Method Details

    • registerAsOIC

      public void registerAsOIC()
      Allows the officer to register as Officer-In-Charge (OIC) for available projects. Checks for slot availability, application conflicts, and date overlaps.

    • viewAssignedProject

      public void viewAssignedProject()
      Displays the project currently assigned to the officer, if any.

    • viewRegistrationStatus

      public void viewRegistrationStatus()
      Lists all registrations the officer has made and their statuses.

    • replyToEnquiry

      public void replyToEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry, String response)
      Allows the officer to respond to an enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - The enquiry to respond to.
      response - The response text.

    • bookFlat

      public void bookFlat()
      Books a flat for a successful applicant in the officer's assigned project. Verifies availability of the flat type and applicant's status.

    • getApprovedApplications

      public ArrayList<Application> getApprovedApplications()
      Returns a list of applications that have been approved (i.e., have a status of "Successful") for the project assigned to the current officer.

      This method filters all applications in the repository to include only those that:

      • Belong to the same project as the officer's assigned project
      • Have an application status equal to "Successful" (case-insensitive)
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of approved Application objects; returns an empty list if none match

    • generateReceipt

      public void generateReceipt()
      Generates and displays a receipt for a booked flat from the officerâ€™s assigned project. Allows selection from booked applications.
